sentences.sContent: He escaped across the border disguised as a priest.
sentences.sCn: 他装扮成神父越境逃走了。

synos.tran: 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

phrases.pCn: 伪装，假扮成；托辞；以……为借口

remMethod.val: dis + guise(姿态， 伪装) → 假扮； 掩饰

trans.tranCn: 假装, 伪装, 掩饰
trans.tranOther: to change someone’s appearance so that people cannot recognize them
